greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Column 0 of the matrix logarithm (A111941) of triangle A111940, which shifts columns left and up under matrix inverse; these terms are the result of multiplying the element in row n by n!.
comment: Signed version of A010551, with leading zero.
formula: G.f.: x*G(0) where G(k) = 1 - (k+1)*x/(1 - x*(k+1)/(x*(k+1) - 1/G(k+1) )); (continued fraction, 3-step). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Nov 28 2012
G.f.: G(0)*x/2, where G(k) = 1 + 1/(1 - x*(k+1)/(x*(1*k+1) - 1/(1 + 1/(1 - x*(k+1)/(x*(1*k+1) - 1/G(k+1)))))); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Jun 20 2013
G.f.: x/G(0), where G(k) = 1 - x*(k+1)/(x*(k+1) - 1/(1 - x*(k+1)/G(k+1) )); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Aug 07 2013
xref: Cf. A111940 (triangle), A111941 (matrix log), A110505 (variant), A010551 (unsigned).
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 23 2005
